Texts.Chs: ^orange;基因定序仪^reset;可以生成你已获得的基因，无论是^orange;基因提取器^reset;获得的，还是^orange;野外探险^reset;获得的。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Gene Sequencer^reset; can produce genes that you've already discovered, offering a consistent alternative to acquiring them ^green;from extraction^reset; via the ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 有了^orange;基因定序仪^reset;，你再也不需要在^orange;基因提取器^reset;里^green;浪费种子^reset;了。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Gene Sequencer^reset; is useful to produce genes you already discovered ^green;without needing to melt down seeds^reset; in the ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset;.
